decisionGates.businessTradeoff: Shipping now is faster, but hold avoids likely compliance rework.

slides.title: Step 1 of 5: Launch Risk Snapshot
slides.now: Start with business pressure: blocked listings and launch delays in the current batch.
slides.next: Open one blocked SKU and show why it is blocked.
slides.customerImpact: Executives get immediate context on revenue risk before product detail.
slides.whatUserSees: Batch summary with Ready, At Risk, and Blocked SKUs.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Batch triage across listing data, document presence, and scope hints.
slides.legalBasis: No legal determination at this step.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Missing compliance documentation can trigger listing impact and account-health pressure.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Prioritize blocked SKUs first to prevent late-stage rework.

slides.title: Step 2 of 5: Blocker Found - Radio Evidence Gap
slides.now: Show one concrete blocker: radio-enabled SKU with non-radio documentation set.
slides.customerImpact: Moves from abstract risk to a concrete launch blocker in seconds.
slides.whatUserSees: RED scope mismatch and missing radio-focused evidence.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Radio applicability detection plus directive/evidence alignment checks.
slides.legalBasis: Radio equipment requires RED-aligned conformity evidence.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Submitting incomplete evidence increases request/removal risk.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Treat as blocked until RED-aligned evidence is attached.
slides.fixAction: Request RED DoC and radio test evidence from supplier.

slides.title: Step 3 of 5: Decision Gate - Ship, Hold, or Escalate
slides.now: Convert findings into an accountable decision with explicit tradeoff.
slides.customerImpact: Governance becomes auditable instead of ad hoc.
slides.whatUserSees: Decision gate with recommendation and decision capture.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Aggregates unresolved critical gaps into one decision point.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Risk statement is guidance, not a platform prediction.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: HOLD and assign corrective actions with owner accountability.
slides.fixAction: Record decision and assign supplier/localization tasks.

slides.title: Step 4 of 5: Role Outputs - Who Does What Next
slides.now: Generate role-specific packets for Ops, Compliance, Engineering, and RP.
slides.next: Close with pilot metrics and paid-pilot scope.
slides.customerImpact: Findings become executable work queues instead of static reports.
slides.whatUserSees: Role output cards with actions and required fields.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Maps each issue to ownership and next-action fields.
slides.legalBasis: Legal references remain attached in compliance packet exports.
slides.marketplacePolicy: No marketplace decision at this step.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Use outputs as daily handoff artifacts across teams.
slides.fixAction: Distribute packets and track issue closure.

slides.title: Step 5 of 5: Pilot Close - Metrics and Scope
slides.now: Anchor the close on measurable pilot outcomes and bounded scope.
slides.next: End demo and move to pilot scoping.
slides.customerImpact: Clarifies exactly how value will be proven in 30-90 days.
slides.whatUserSees: Pilot metrics card: missing-doc rate, review cycle, rework loops.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Summarizes evidence risk posture and current readiness mix.
slides.legalBasis: No legal determination at final summary stage.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Risk view is heuristic guidance and not an Amazon decision.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Run a paid pilot with explicit success thresholds and owners.
slides.fixAction: Confirm pilot scope, KPIs, cadence, and decision date.
